divs: Sighting Detailsi got off of work and as i was walking to my car looked up at the moon and noticed a flaring gold glowing object heading south and then turned quick to the southwest hovered for 2 minutes then it disappeared no idea what that was maybe someone else saw it to
trends: There have been 23 other sightings in Concord
There were no other sightings in Concord on or around December 25th 2012
Summary: Got out of work looked up to moon and noticed glowing flaring object
